metadata.name: Come di pietra ferita
metadata.description:
In this work, starting from a painting on canvas inspired by a roman marble sculpture of Aphrodite (copy from a greek bronze by Diodalsa), I've mixed analogic and digital painting, trying to focus and emphatize the romantic effect of erosion on marble made by elements and time, with colours, textures and layers.
3800x3000px 350dpi
